entries.name: Abominable Yeti
entries.description: A massive, fearsome creature of frozen mountains.

traits.name: Fear of Fire
traits.description: If the yeti takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Snow Camouflage
traits.description: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Chilling Gaze
actions.description: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 (3d6) cold damage and then be paralyzed for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.description: The yeti exhales a 30-foot cone of frigid air. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Bone Devil
entries.description: A skeletal fiend that serves as Hell's inquisitor.

data.damageResistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

entries.name: Clay Golem
entries.description: A humanoid construct molded from clay and animated by magic.

data.damageImmunities: acid, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
data.conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
data.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Acid Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

traits.name: Berserk
traits.description: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 60 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

actions.name: Haste (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: Until the end of its next turn, the golem magically gains a +2 bonus to its AC, has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and can use its slam attack as a bonus action.

entries.name: Cloud Giant
entries.description: A noble giant dwelling in castles atop clouds.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description:
The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic, fog cloud, light
3/day each: feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis
1/day each: control weather, gaseous form

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two morningstar attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Fire Giant
entries.description: A massive giant attuned to elemental fire.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Glabrezu
entries.description: A powerful demon with four arms and a talent for deception.

data.damageResistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description:
The glabrezu's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16). The glabrezu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic
1/day each: confusion, fly, power word stun

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The glabrezu makes four attacks: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it makes two attacks with its pincers and casts one spell.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Fist
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Gray Slaad
entries.description: A powerful slaad capable of shapeshifting and magic.

data.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 13

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description:
The slaad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The slaad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic, detect thoughts, invisibility (self only), mage hand, major image
2/day each: fear, fly, fireball, tongues
1/day: plane shift (self only)

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws or greatsword.

actions.name: Bite (Slaad Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws (Slaad Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Nycaloth
entries.description: A winged yugoloth mercenary from the Lower Planes.

data.damageResistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
data.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description:
The nycaloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The nycaloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only)
2/day each: mirror image, plane shift (self only)

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The nycaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The nycaloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The nycaloth makes two melee attacks, or it makes one melee attack and teleports before or after the attack.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: The nycaloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

entries.name: Treant
entries.description: An ancient tree animated to serve as guardian of the forest.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The treant makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
actions.description: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

entries.name: Young Blue Dragon
entries.description: A young chromatic dragon dwelling in deserts.

data.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 19

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The dragon exhales lightning in an 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Young Silver Dragon
entries.description: A young metallic dragon known for its kindness.

data.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

Cold Breath: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Paralyzing Breath: The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
